languages.text: На допросе старец сообщил, что является преданным слугой династии фон Валанциус. Четыре десятилетия назад он был направлен с важной миссией Мастером шепотов Войгтвиром в данную систему. Двадцать лет заняло выполнение задания, и еще двадцать лет он ждал, когда его хозяева явятся за ним. Покидая корабль, бродяга был юным амбициозным шпионом, и теперь он счастлив вновь взойти на борт.

During his interrogation, the old man says he is a loyal servant of House von Valancius. Four decades ago, he was sent on an important mission to this system by Master of Whispers Voigtvir. It took him twenty years to complete the mission. He spent the next twenty waiting for his masters to collect him. The vagrant was an ambitious young spy when he left the ship, and coming aboard again has made him very emotional.

Четыре десятилетия назад он был направлен с важной миссией Мастером шепотов Войгтвиром в данную систему. He spent the next twenty waiting for his masters to collect him. The tramp was an ambitious young spy when he left the ship, and coming aboard again has made him very emotional.

languages.text: Durante el interrogatorio, el anciano declara ser un leal sirviente de la casa von Valancius. Hace cuatro décadas, el maestro de susurros Voigtvir le envió en una misión importante a este sistema. Le llevó veinte años completarla. Pasó los siguientes veinte esperando a que sus señores le recogieran. El vagabundo era un joven espía ambicioso cuando dejó la nave, y al volver a bordo se ha emocionado.
languages.original_text: During his interrogation, the old man says he is a loyal servant of House von Valancius. Four decades ago, he was sent on an important mission to this system by Master of Whispers Voigtvir. It took him twenty years to complete the mission. He spent the next twenty waiting for his masters to collect him. The vagrant was an ambitious young spy when he left the ship, and coming aboard again has made him very emotional.

traits.locale_text: Durante el interrogatorio, el anciano declara ser un leal sirviente de la casa von Valancius. Hace cuatro décadas, el maestro de susurros Voigtvir le envió en una misión importante a este sistema. Le llevó veinte años completarla. Pasó los siguientes veinte esperando a que sus señores le recogieran. El vagabundo era un joven espía ambicioso cuando dejó la nave, y al volver a bordo se ha emocionado.

languages.text: 尋問の中で、老人は自分がフォン・ヴァランシウス家の忠実な従者だと言った。40年前、男は囁きの主ボイドヴィルに言われて、この星系に重要な任務のため送り込まれたらしい。任務が完了するまで20年かかったという。それからの20年間は、主が迎えに来るのを待っていたのだ。かつて、船を降りたときは野心的な若手スパイだった放浪者は、再び船に乗って感情が溢れ出してしまった。
languages.original_text: During his interrogation, the old man says he is a loyal servant of House von Valancius. Four decades ago, he was sent on an important mission to this system by Master of Whispers Voigtvir. It took him twenty years to complete the mission. He spent the next twenty waiting for his masters to collect him. The vagrant was an ambitious young spy when he left the ship, and coming aboard again has made him very emotional.

traits.locale_text: 尋問の中で、老人は自分がフォン・ヴァランシウス家の忠実な従者だと言った。40年前、男は囁きの主ボイドヴィルに言われて、この星系に重要な任務のため送り込まれたらしい。任務が完了するまで20年かかったという。それからの20年間は、主が迎えに来るのを待っていたのだ。かつて、船を降りたときは野心的な若手スパイだった男は、再び船に乗って感情が溢れ出してしまった。

languages.text: 审讯期间，老人说他是冯·瓦兰修斯家族的忠实仆人。四十年前，低语之主维特威尔派遣他前往这个星系，执行某项重要任务。他花了二十年时间才完成那项任务，在接下来的二十年里，他一直在等待他的主人接他回去。这个流浪汉出发的时候，还是位雄心勃勃的年轻特工，能再次回到船上，他感到百感交集。
languages.original_text: During his interrogation, the old man says he is a loyal servant of House von Valancius. Four decades ago, he was sent on an important mission to this system by Master of Whispers Voigtvir. It took him twenty years to complete the mission. He spent the next twenty waiting for his masters to collect him. The vagrant was an ambitious young spy when he left the ship, and coming aboard again has made him very emotional.

traits.locale_text: 审讯期间，老人说他是冯·瓦兰修斯家族的忠实仆人。四十年前，低语之主维特威尔派遣他前往这个星系，执行某项重要任务。他花了二十年时间才完成那项任务，在接下来的二十年里，他一直在等待他的主人接他回去。这个流浪汉出发的时候，还是位雄心勃勃的年轻特工，能再次回到船上，他感到百感交集。

languages.text: Während des Verhörs sagte der alte Mann, er sei ein treuer Diener des Hauses Valancius. Vor vier Jahrzehnten wurde er von Voigtvir, dem Meister des Geflüsters, auf eine wichtige Mission in dieses System geschickt. Er hat zwanzig Jahre gebraucht, um die Mission abzuschließen. Die nächsten zwanzig Jahre lang hat er darauf gewartet, dass seine Meister ihn abholen. Der Vagabund hatte das Schiff damals als ehrgeiziger junger Spion verlassen. Nun wieder an Bord zu kommen, hat ihn emotional werden lassen.
languages.original_text: During his interrogation, the old man says he is a loyal servant of House von Valancius. Four decades ago, he was sent on an important mission to this system by Master of Whispers Voigtvir. It took him twenty years to complete the mission. He spent the next twenty waiting for his masters to collect him. The vagrant was an ambitious young spy when he left the ship, and coming aboard again has made him very emotional.

traits.locale_text: Während des Verhörs sagte der alte Mann, er sei ein treuer Diener des Hauses Valancius. Vor vier Jahrzehnten wurde er von Voigtvir, dem Meister des Geflüsters, auf eine wichtige Mission in dieses System geschickt. Er hat zwanzig Jahre gebraucht, um die Mission abzuschließen. Die nächsten zwanzig Jahre lang hat er darauf gewartet, dass seine Meister ihn abholen. Der Vagabund hatte das Schiff damals als ehrgeiziger junger Spion verlassen. Nun wieder an Bord zu kommen, hat ihn emotional werden lassen.

languages.text: Lors de son interrogatoire, le vieil homme a affirmé être un loyal serviteur de la maison von Valancius. Il aurait été envoyé dans ce système quatre décennies plus tôt par Voigtvir, le maître des murmures. Il lui a fallu vingt longues années pour accomplir sa mission, et il a passé les vingt suivantes à attendre que son maître revienne le chercher. Quand il a quitté le vaisseau, le vagabond était encore un jeune espion ambitieux. Remonter à bord l'a semble-t-il rendu très émotif.
languages.original_text: During his interrogation, the old man says he is a loyal servant of House von Valancius. Four decades ago, he was sent on an important mission to this system by Master of Whispers Voigtvir. It took him twenty years to complete the mission. He spent the next twenty waiting for his masters to collect him. The vagrant was an ambitious young spy when he left the ship, and coming aboard again has made him very emotional.

Il aurait été envoyé dans ce système quatre décennies plus tôt par Voigtvir, le maître des murmures. Il lui a fallu vingt longues années pour accomplir sa mission, et il a passé les vingt suivantes à attendre que son maître revienne le chercher. Quand il a quitté le vaisseau, le vagabond était encore un jeune espion ambitieux. Remonter à bord l'a semble-t-il rendu très émotif.

languages.text: İhtiyar adam, sorgusu esnasında von Valancius Hanesi'nin sadık bir hizmetkârı olduğunu söylüyor. Kırk yıl önce Fısıltı Üstadı Voigtvir tarafından önemli bir misyon için bu sisteme gönderilmiş. Misyonu tamamlaması yirmi yılını almış. Sonraki yirmi yılı da efendilerinin kendisini alması için bekleyerek geçirmiş. Dilenci, gemiden ayrıldığında hevesli genç bir ajanmış. Güverteye yeniden adım atmasıyla yoğun bir duygu seline kapılıyor.
languages.original_text: During his interrogation, the old man says he is a loyal servant of House von Valancius. Four decades ago, he was sent on an important mission to this system by Master of Whispers Voigtvir. It took him twenty years to complete the mission. He spent the next twenty waiting for his masters to collect him. The vagrant was an ambitious young spy when he left the ship, and coming aboard again has made him very emotional.
